info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:01PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL COLUMBIANA... NORTHERN BEAVER AND SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM EDT... At 1201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Calcutta, or near East Palestine, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Castle, Beaver Falls, East Palestine, Ellwood City, Calcutta, Ohioville, New Waterford, Patterson Township, Big Beaver, New Beaver, West Mayfield, Ellport, Koppel, Wampum, South New Castle, Patterson Heights, New Galilee, Enon Valley, Darlington, and Rogers. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 18. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 17 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
